description.b: Use the ARTIST Technical Feasibility Tool (TFT) to evaluate how difficult it is to migrate your application to the Cloud and how much effort could potentially cost.

item.title: Locate the MAT report for the project in your workspace.

description.b: Select the XML file containing the migration goals which is generated by the MAT for your project.
Follow the steps below to review and edit the the migration goals.

subitem.label: Click on the green arrow on the right to automatically open the selected MAT report in the Migration Goals View.

In the 'Migration Goals View', review the default target cloud platform. You can enable or disable the goals by clicking the check boxes. For changing the migration goals, you need to go back and redo 'Perform evaluation analysis' step.

item.title: Locate the component model UML file for your project in your workspace.

description.b: Select the UML file containing the component model which is generated by the MAT.
Follow the steps below to review and edit the the migration strategies.

subitem.label: Click on the green arrow on the right to automatically open the selected component model in the Inventory View.

Go to 'Inventory View' and review the Migration strategies per component. To change a strategy, clicking on the 'Migration Strategy' cell of the component in the table and clicking the ... button on the right-side of the cell. This action opens the 'Migration Strategy Selection Dialog'. In this dialog, the user is free to change the migration strategy suggested by TFT, remove strategies and add new ones. The dialog allows only one strategy per category.
